articles.title: Lunar cycles can affect our sleep, study - Tech Explorist
articles.description: Scientists report that sleep cycles in people oscillate during the 29.5-day lunar cycle: In the days leading up to a full moon, people go to sleep later in the evening and sleep for shorter periods of time.

articles.description: The first total lunar eclipse of 2021 will occur on May 26. The eclipse would begin at 2:17 pm in India and end at 7:19 pm. Here is all you need to know about the first Chandra Grahan of year.
